short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ChatGPT Avatar Remover is a Chrome extension designed to enhance your chat experience by removing avatars from ChatGPT conversations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Focus on the content and not the form, ChatGPT Avatar Remover enhances your chat experience by removing avatars from ChatGPT conversations

ChatGPT looks so nice thanks to this extension:
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/custom-chatgpt-design-pow/hmmijabfpeeiddcjlckllcogkpcaglhg

The code used for this can be found here: https://github.com/Austinae/ChatGPT-Avatar-Remover
